\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$int K, typename T, bool REBALANCE = false, bool CUT\+\_\+\+ON\+\_\+\+INSERT = false, bool MAINTAIN\+\_\+\+SIZE = false, bool MAINTAIN\+\_\+\+HEIGHT = false$>$\newline
class KHPTree$<$ K, T, REBALANCE, CUT\+\_\+\+ON\+\_\+\+INSERT, MAINTAIN\+\_\+\+SIZE, MAINTAIN\+\_\+\+HEIGHT $>$}

K is the number of dimensions T is search type C is whether to cut included nodes or not
